name: Google Maps FullScreen for RTL users
description:
based on Google Maps - Full Screen (Updated 12. August '08) By Cruse_Car
http://userstyles.org/styles/2447

-adjusted to Right-To-Left users so the search result panel will be shown at the right side of the screen
-search field is floating at the top of screen
-Maximum map with all neccesary items
-ads invisible

p.s

if you're a LTR user and you want this, just replace every "right" in the CSS to "left" and you'll be good..
